note.p: Birth: The Manse, Crieff, Strathearn, Scotland (15 April 1850)

Career: Demonstrator in Anatomy, Edinburgh (1882); Professor of Anatomy, school of the Royal College of Surgeons of Ireland (1883-1903); Professor of Anatomy, Trinity College, Dublin (1903-1909); Professor of Anatomy, University of Edinburgh; died of a spinal tumor
AssocMaterial: CSAC 42/6/76. Papers deposited in Edinburgh University Library
